Verses: 1 isravel Puththirare, Karththaraagiya Naan Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Varappannina Muzhukkudumbamaagiya Ungalukku Virodhamaai Solliya Indha Vasanaththaik Kelungal.
2 boomiyin Ellaa Vamsangalukkullum Ungalai Maaththiram Arindhukonden; Aagaiyaal Ungaludaiya Ellaa Akkiramangalinimiththamum Ungalai Dhandippen.
4 thanakku Irai Adappadaamalirukkak Kaattile Singam Kerchchikkumo? Iraipidiyaamalirukkumpodhu Paalasingam Than Kebiyilirundhu Saththamidumo?
5 kuruvikkuth Tharaiyile Surukkuppodappadaadhirundhaal, Adhu Kanniyil Adappadumo? Ondrum Padaadhirukkaiyil, Kanni Tharaiyilirundhu Edukkappadumo?
6 ooril Ekkaalam Oodhinaal, Janangal Kalangaadhiruppaargalo? Karththarudaiya Seyal Illaamal Ooril Theengu Undaagumo?
7 karththaraagiya Aandavar Theerkkadharisigalaagiya Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukkuth Thamadhu Ragasiyaththai Velippaduththaamal Oru Kaariyaththaiyum Seyyaar.
8 singam Kerchchikkiradhu, Yaar Bayappadaadhiruppaan? Karththaraagiya Aandavar Pesugiraar, Yaar Theerkkadharisanam Sollaadhiruppaan?

9 neengal Samaariyaavin Parvadhangalil Vandhu Koodi, Adhin Naduvil Nadakkira Periya Kalagangalaiyum Adharkul Seyyappadugira Idukkangalaiyum Paarungal Endru Asthoththin Aramanaigalmelum, Egipthudhesaththin Aramanaigalmelum Koorungal.
10 avargal Semmaiyaanadhai Seyya Ariyaamal, Thangal Aramanaigalil Kodumaiyaiyum Kollaiyaiyum Kuviththukkollugiraargal Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
11 aagaiyaal Saththuru Vandhu, Dhesaththai Soozhndhukondu, Unbelaththai Unnilirundhu Atruppogappannuvaan; Appozhudhu Un Aramanaigal Kollaiyidappadum Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

12 melum: Oru Meyppan Irandu Kaalgalaiyaavadhu Oru Kaadhin Thundaiyaavadhu Singaththin Vaayilirundhu Pidungith Thappuvikkumaappola, Samaariyaavil Kudiyirukkira Isravel Puththirar Oru Padukkaiyin Moolaiyilirundhum, Oru Manjaththinmelirundhum Thappuvikkappaduvaargalendru, Karththar Sollugiraar.
13 aagaiyaal Neengal Kettu Yaakkobu Vamsaththaarukkulle Saatchiyaaga Arivikkavendiyadhu: Senaigalin Dhevanaayirukkira Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal,
14 naan Israveludaiya Paadhagangalinimiththam Avanai Visaarikkumnaalile Naan Beththelin Palipeedangalai Visaarippen; Palipeedaththin Kombugal Vettundu Tharaiyile Vizhum.
15 maarikaalaththu Veettaiyum Kodaikaalaththu Veettaiyum Azhippen; Appozhudhu Yaanaiththandhaththaal Seyyappatta Veedugal Azhiyum; Periya Veedugalukkum Mudivu Varum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
